definition: to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
stick/pole/lever/classifier for long objects such as guns

sentences.english: Returns an array of stings describing the connected joysticks.
sentences.chinese: 返回一个用来描述已连接的控制杆的字符串集合。

sentences.english: The worker depressed the lever to start the machine.
sentences.chinese: 工人压下控制杆开动机器。
运输安装主轴的控制杆。

sentences.english: This program works with the Joysticks users have attached to the computer.
sentences.chinese: 本软件适合用控制杆操作电脑的用者。

sentences.english: Do this by easing up on the pressure being applied to the joystick.
sentences.chinese: 做这由缓和在压力适用于控制杆。

sentences.english: I just push this little lever.
sentences.chinese: 我就推一下这个小控制杆。

sentences.english: Set the Sonometer at the edge of a table so the tensioning lever extends beyond the table.
sentences.chinese: 将振动频率计置于桌子边缘，使张力控制杆伸出桌面。

sentences.english: Horizontal Stabilizer, Tab Control Rod Fairing, 344PT.
sentences.chinese: 水平安定面，调整片控制杆整流罩，344PT。

sentences.english: Clearances for the control rods may be impaired by obstacles in the path of the rods.
sentences.chinese: 棒间隙的控制杆受损，可通过在路径的障碍。

sentences.english: It seems the control rods aren't adequate to regain control of the fission.
sentences.chinese: 貌似控制杆难以重新控制裂变过程。

sentences.english: Horizontal Stabilizer, Tab Control Rod Fairing, 334PT.
sentences.chinese: 水平安定面，调整片控制杆整流罩，334PT。

sentences.english: The man tells the guy to pull the stick to hang Amar.
sentences.chinese: 该名男子告诉家伙把控制杆拉挂阿马尔。

sentences.english: He switched the control-lever to "off" position.
sentences.chinese: 他把控制杆拨到“关”的位置。

definition: to pull out/to pull a lever
button or key (on a device)/keystroke/CL:個|个[ge4]/to press a button
